title: Hongkongers congratulate Greta Thunberg: TIME's PotY

replies.msg:
Huge generous congratulations to Greta.

Hongkongers, despite its honour, have not been fighting to make it to the cover of the TIME Magazine - we are not fuelled by pleasing their editorial team.
Rather, Hongkongers have been striving for the democracy and freedom which they were promised, is being increasingly and exponentially suppressed, and which they deserve as human beings and as a part of the world's global community.

The world has seen, at least strikingly over the past half a year, how civilized and persevering the people of Hong Kong have been in striving to protect their homeland.
We sincerely congratulate Theta for the recognition she has been given, especially for showing the world how youth activism may empower the world to change for the better and demonstrating the capability and determination of our youth to defend what we believe in.

We also sincerely thank the international community for your support and encouragement, as shown in the polls on the TIME's website and continued throughout this movement.
Further from what Greta is currently doing, the people of Hong Kong will continue to defend our homeland and stand, with our friends in the international community, on the global frontier against totalitarianism!

Free Hong Kong, democracy now!
